select oi.id, oi.code, oi.pharmacy_id, oi.total_cost, oi.user_id, oi.create_date, oi.logistics_id, oi.order_status, oi.del_flag, oi.staff_id, ui.id AS userId, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress, phi.name AS pharmacyName, phi.address, phi.legal_person, phi.phone as pharmacyPhone, oe.id as evaluateFlag, si.name AS staffName, si.images AS staffImages from order_info oi left join pharmacy_info phi on (phi.id = oi.pharmacy_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) left join order_evaluate oe on (oe.order_id = oi.id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = oi.staff_id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND phi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.pharmacyName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{orderInfo.userId}
AND phi.user_id = #{orderInfo.pharmacyId}
order by oi.create_date desc
select sum(od.quantity) as count, di.name from order_detail od left join drug_info di on (di.id = od.drug_id) where 1 = 1 group by od.drug_id

select oi.id, oi.code, oi.pharmacy_id, oi.total_cost, oi.user_id, oi.create_date, oi.logistics_id, oi.order_status, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
AND oi.pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId}

select oi.id, oi.code, oi.pharmacy_id, oi.total_cost, oi.user_id, oi.create_date, oi.logistics_id, oi.order_status, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y')
AND oi.pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId}

SELECT oi.`code`, li.remark, li.create_date as createDate FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN logistics_info li ON ( oi.id = li.order_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = oi.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND oi.order_status = 2 AND ui.user_id = #{userId} AND li.current_logistics = 1

select oi.id, oi.code, oi.pharmacy_id, oi.total_cost, oi.user_id, oi.create_date, oi.logistics_id, oi.order_status, ui.name, ui.phone, ui.address AS userAddress from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y' ) = #{year} and DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%m' ) = #{month}

WITH RECURSIVE DateSeries AS ( -- 锚点成员 (Anchor Member): 设置起始日期 SELECT CAST(#{startTime} AS DATE) AS days UNION ALL -- 递归成员 (Recursive Member): 递增日期直到结束日期 SELECT DATE_ADD(days, INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM DateSeries WHERE days < CAST(#{endTime} AS DATE) ) SELECT DATE_FORMAT( t.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS date, IFNULL(sum(od.quantity), 0) AS quantity FROM DateSeries t LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( t.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON (od.order_id = oi.id and od.drug_id = #{drugId}) GROUP BY t.days ORDER BY t.days ASC;

SELECT od.drug_id AS drugId, oi.pharmacy_id AS pharmacyId, di.name AS drugName, SUM(od.quantity) AS quantity, SUM(od.quantity * od.unit_price) AS amount, DATE(oi.create_date) AS saleDate FROM order_detail od LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON od.order_id = oi.id LEFT JOIN drug_info di ON od.drug_id = di.id WHERE oi.pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId} AND oi.create_date >= #{startTime} AND oi.create_date <= #{endTime} AND oi.order_status != 0 -- 排除已取消的订单 GROUP BY od.drug_id, DATE(oi.create_date) ORDER BY oi.create_date
